786780.name: Fantasy Grounds - Xenomorphs: The Fall of Somerset Landing (W.O.I.N. N.E.W.)
786780.description:
Xenomorphs: The Fall of Somerset Landing (N.E.W.)

Dare to enter a gritty setting of sci-fi survival horror!
In these pages you will find a survival horror setting for your science-fiction WOIN games detailing known space, careers, equipment, monsters, and more; plus a detailed terraforming colony on a small, weatherbeaten moon some 40 light years from Earth, and a terrifying adventure which charts the events just prior to the colonys loss of contact with the Chen Zua Corporation, the company behind the terraforming technology that oversees the United Planets Terraforming Contracts.
Terror and monsters await in the depth of space!
So welcome to Somerset Landing and hold on tight as all hell is about to break loose!
This product includes:
  • 10 Careers
  • 3 Items
  • Over 50 exploits
  • 5 Species
  • A detailed reference manual for easy reading
  • 10 Pregenerated Characters
  • 20 Story entries
By Russ Morrissey, Darren Pearce, Angus Abranson
Conversion by Colin Richardson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the W.O.I.N. ruleset (currently available as part of N.E.W, and available for O.L.D. and N.O.W in the future)
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Dominic Morta
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the WOiN ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
